title: Best of The Herd for 06/17/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for 06/17/2019
description:
Colin thinks the Lakers finally chose a direction and that's why the trade for Anthony Davis makes sense. He doesn't think Lonzo Ball has a long career in New Orleans ahead of him. He talks about where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, Fox Sports Radio Host Doug Gottlieb comes in studio to defend the Lakers trade because whoever gets the best player always wins the deal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
